item.title: Ice barrage (again...)
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Fan_XX SSG Fan XX
item.description:
@SSG_Fan_XX wrote:

here try my barrage >.>

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > -94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { if(castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay >= 10) { hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.barrage(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(85, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); } } }
Warning…You do need runes for it xD

Read full topic
